Texto: 
leukocytosis.  degreased breath sounds and eugopahny, right upper hemithorax.
portable chest radiograph shows consolidation with air bronchograms in the right upper lobe.  ct shows similar findings.
right upper lobe pneumonia.
-community acquired pneumonia.
-atypical pneumonia.
-post obstructive pneumonia (less likely given ct findings)
-bac (less likely by age and history)
29 year old male with sob, fever, and cough.
